title: Chukzy1992
author: Chukzy1992
content: Introverts people may be seen as shy persons, they always isolate themselves from people around them.While extroverts are considered "the life of a party.Introverts people prefer to spend time alone with one or two close friends while the extroverts persons on the other hands becomes bored when they are alone, instead they function well when they are in group.for example many people thinks that an extroverts persons are more highly valued than introverts because shyness are really discouraged.But despites there attitudes "Psychologists believes that both personalities have there own benefits.           If you can't decide whether you are an introverts or extroverts, it may be you have an equal mix of the qualities of both personalities.

comments.author: Shielding2002
comments.body: I dont really like public gatherings or speaking in public. I'm definitely an introvert

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: I'd rather be alone, or just with close friends. if I attend a party, I always want to go home immediately. So obviously I'm an introvert.

comments.author: acener
comments.body: Actually I'm an ambivert.I enjoy spending time with my friends or huge group, and there are times that I enjoy being alone.

comments.author: nicolas222
comments.body: unfortunately I'm not very sociable and this penalizes me at work
